text:
Nice to meet you, friends
I have a concern.
There was one thing I didn't understand during the migration of hapikey to private key, so I left a post here

`/cms/v3/hubdb/tables/{tableIdOrName}/rows?hapikey={my hapikey}`

When called to , it's getting data normally.

But in a private key way
`/cms/v3/hubdb/tables/{tableIdOrName}/rows`
```header: {
  Authorization: {my private key},
  ...
} ```
CORS will occur when called,

I don't know why

Does anyone know why?
